attributes.action: Ensure that justice is seen to be served on all parties directly or indirectly involved in the unlawful killing of Jean Charles de Menezes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 22 July, 2005, Jean Charles de Menezes was shot dead, by police who mistook him for one of four would-be suicide bombers who attacked London's transport system the previous day.
To date no person or persons have been charged with his murder.
Corporate liability and duty of care by law applies to all public services, including and the police.
Positions of command carry great responsibility. It is therefore necessary for those responsible be brought to book and charged with unlawful killing of Jean Charles de Menezes
